I want to help ensure we get this resolved for you as quickly as possible, so once I have that information, I can look into it right away. Thank you for your patience!

The response offers strong reassurances, expressing a desire to resolve the issue quickly and thanking the customer for their patience, which fosters a supportive atmosphere.

I completely understand how frustrating this situation must be for you, and I truly empathize with your feelings. It can be really stressful when something as important as a refund doesn’t arrive on time, especially after you've already reached out about it.

Let’s get this sorted out for you. Could you please provide me with your order number or any other details related to the refund? I’ll do my best to expedite the process and keep you updated on the status. Thank you for your patience during this time. You deserve a resolution!
